MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 12-JAN-2021 05:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is power cut in the DG11, DG12 and DG16 postcode areas of Lockerbie, Annan and Gretna. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified broken overhead line equipment near to Newton Village substation and we now expect your supply to be restored by 5AM. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:30 AM on Tuesday, 12 January 2021.
